com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Hs5Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Hs5Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Hs5Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the Hs5

    The class provides methods to control Hs5 device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Create user management.
      void DeleteUserInScale(int userPstCode)
      Remove user information from the specified position of the scale.
      void destroy() 
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect device This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately. If disconnect successfully, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String mac, String deviceType, int status, int errorID)
      The status will be 2(iHealthDevicesManager.DEVICE_STATE_DISCONNECTED). Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
      iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
      void getOfflineData(int userPstCode, int userId)
      Get offline data of specified user This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately. If get successfully, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
      The action is HsProfile.ACTION_NO_HISTORICALDATA or HsProfile.ACTION_HISTORICAL_DATA_HS. The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the action. If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
      The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
      the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.

        Constructor for Hs5Control.
        Parameters:
        userName - email of the user
        context - Context
        deviceMac - device mac
        deviceIp - device Ip address
        comm - communication class
        baseCommCallback - communication callback
        insCallback - Hs5 device callback.
        type - the type of ihealth device iHealthDevicesManager.TYPE_HS5

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        start identify
        Specified by:
        init in interface DeviceControl

      • creatManagement

        public void creatManagement(int userId)
        Create user management.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If create successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is HsProfile.ACTION_MANAGEMENT_HS.
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        userId - user's ID.
        Range: [1, 2147483647(0x7FFFFFFF)]

      • WriteUserToScale

        public void WriteUserToScale(int userPstCode,
                             int userId,
                             int age,
                             int height,
                             int isSporter,
                             int gender)
        Put the user information to the specified position.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If create successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is HsProfile.ACTION_ADDUSER_HS.
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        userPstCode - the position of the scale from 0 to 19
        Range: [0, 19]
        userId - user identify card number
        Range: [1, 2147483647(0x7FFFFFFF)]
        age - the age of user
        Range: [7, 99]
        height - height of user (in cm)
        Range: [81, 219]
        isSporter - Whether user is sportsman or not.
        • 0 indicates user is not sportsman
        • 1 indicates user is sportsman
        gender - User's gender
        • 0 indicates female
        • 1 indicates male

      • DeleteUserInScale

        public void DeleteUserInScale(int userPstCode)
        Remove user information from the specified position of the scale.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If remove successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is HsProfile.ACTION_DELETEUSER_HS.
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        userPstCode - the position in scale
        Range: [0, 19]

      • updateUserInfo

        public void updateUserInfo(int userPstCode,
                           int userId,
                           int age,
                           int height,
                           int isSporter,
                           int gender)
        Update user information of the scale.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If update successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is HsProfile.ACTION_UPDATEUSER_HS.
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        userPstCode - the position of the scale from 0 to 19
        Range: [0, 19]
        userId - user identify card number
        Range: [1, 2147483647(0x7FFFFFFF)]
        age - the age of user
        Range: [7, 99]
        height - height of user (in cm)
        Range: [81, 219]
        isSporter - Whether user is sportsman or not.
        • 0 indicates user is not sportsman
        • 1 indicates user is sportsman
        gender - User's gender
        • 0 indicates female
        • 1 indicates male

      • getOfflineData

        public void getOfflineData(int userPstCode,
                           int userId)
        Get offline data of specified user
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is HsProfile.ACTION_NO_HISTORICALDATA or HsProfile.ACTION_HISTORICAL_DATA_HS.
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        userPstCode - the position of the scale from 0 to 19
        Range: [0, 19]
        userId - user identify card number
        Range: [1, 2147483647(0x7FFFFFFF)]

      • startMeasure

        public void startMeasure(int userPstCode,
                         int userId)
        Start measure to get live data and the result data.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If scale upload data, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be:
            1. HsProfile.ACTION_MEASUREMENT_HS
            2. HsProfile.ACTION_LIVEDATA_HS
            3. HsProfile.ACTION_STABLEDATA_HS
            4. HsProfile.ACTION_IMPEDANCEDATA_HS
            5. HsProfile.ACTION_ONLINE_RESULT_HS
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the actions.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        userPstCode - the position of the scale from 0 to 19
        Range: [0, 19]
        userId - user identify card number
        Range: [1, 2147483647(0x7FFFFFFF)]

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Description copied from interface: DeviceControl
        Disconnect device
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If disconnect successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String mac, String deviceType, int status, int errorID)
          • The status will be 2(iHealthDevicesManager.DEVICE_STATE_DISCONNECTED).
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface DeviceControl

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface DeviceControl
